title: you have fuked the gamplay with your new mission system
body: so it was algood untill u introduced plus 10 assitss carrying a chaos icon, do i have to even continue, that puts every mother fuker in everylnae on a sup trying to get ten kills ruining the game,, i mean ive been with u a long time now and investesd some serious cash into my acount over the years, i started in nborth america before there even was oce, what ur doing to the game is making it harder for people who want to actually climb, theres all ready so much troll sht uve just added an extra mission for trolls to fukin lock on to, what was wrong with the game it has been fine in the aast 2-3 seasons is where weve had the most toxic people since season 1, ive had good mates who play the game since season 1 leave beacause of the simplifiying its not even the same game

replies.body: You do realise it's not just in the one game right? You just need 10 assists total... if you struggle to get 10 assists in more than 3-4 games something is wrong.
Just play some Aram games and walk away with 20 assists every game, regardless of champion.
You dont have to play ranked.. jump in aram its simple
